V0502_01_00_00_0.text:
You Show's here to sing!
Because Dueltaining is our thing!

V0502_01_00_01_0.text: I'll do everything it takes to win this Duel!

V0502_01_00_02_0.text: I have a new way to Duel that you've never seen before!

V0502_01_00_03_0.text:
I have to give my all in every single Duel!
Just like Yuya!

V0502_01_00_04_0.text:
You think I'm scared?
Find out how wrong you are!

V0502_01_00_05_0.text: When everything's at stake, I can't lose the Duel!

V0502_01_00_06_0.text: Why are the police after me?!?

V0502_03_00_01_0.text: This is when I really put on a show!

V0502_03_00_03_0.text:
Don't overthink it!
Just go for it!

V0502_03_00_04_0.text: The one thing I can't do is lose...

V0502_03_00_05_0.text: I just have to believe in this draw...

V0502_05_00_00_0.text:
I'm not giving up!
I believe in my cards!

V0502_06_01_01_0.text: You sure you wanna do that?

V0502_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card!

V0502_07_09_01_0.text: I use the card I set!

V0502_11_01_00_0.text: I summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0502_11_08_01_0.text:
I build the Overlay Network!
Xyz Summon!

V0502_11_09_01_0.text:
I'll bring a new act into my show!
Pendulum Summon!

V0502_16_00_00_0.text: Time for you to face the music!

V0502_21_00_01_0.text:
I'm ready for anything!
Bring it on!

V0502_21_00_02_1.text: Can't wait to see what you're gonna try!

V0502_21_00_03_0.text: With that, I end my turn!

V0502_21_00_04_1.text: How do I get out of this...

V0502_21_00_05_0.text:
It's getting worse and worse...
I have to do something!

V0502_28_00_00_0.text: Join You Show and learn to become pals with your monsters!

V0502_28_00_01_0.text:
Thanks for the Duel!
You helped me believe in myself!

V0502_28_00_02_0.text:
Yuya, I did it!
I'm so happy!

V0502_28_00_03_0.text:
I'm not just a Fusion Duelist.
I'm a Fusion Dueltainer!

V0502_28_00_04_0.text: I'll keep getting stronger so I can help my friends!

V0502_28_00_05_0.text:
Smile, Yuya!
That's the first lesson in Dueltaining!

V0502_28_00_06_0.text: Sora, you're not only a friend, you're also a great teacher!

V0502_28_00_06_1.text: Everything you taught me was the reason I won!

V0502_29_00_01_0.text: It's clear you were the better Duelist today.

V0502_29_00_03_0.text:
It was important that I'd win this Duel...
But I couldn't...

V0502_29_00_05_0.text: Yuya, I know your Dueling will make everyone smile.

V0502_29_00_06_0.text: That's why you're the teacher and I'm the student.

V0502_33_00_02_0.text: This spectacle is far from over!

V0502_30_00_02_0.text: It's too dangerous to continue this Duel!

V0502_34_00_01_0.text: I'm ready to swing into action!

V0502_34_00_02_0.text: Go go go! I'm fired up!

V0502_34_00_04_0.text: I should go for an Action Card! Where is it?

V0502_34_00_05_0.text: You Show Duel School can't lose an Action Duel!

V0502_34_00_06_0.text: Hahaha! No one can defeat Gavel Girl!

V0502_34_00_07_0.text: I don't know what's going on!

V0502_34_00_08_0.text: You're a third, a fourth- No, a hundredth-rate Duelist!

V0502_32_00_01_0.text:
Duelists!
Prepare for battle!
Only one will rule the Duel…
In the ultimate fusion of monsters and mayhem!
The action begins now!
Yu-Gi-Oh!
Duel Links!

V0502_35_00_00_0.text: I'm giving nothing less than my best!

V0502_35_00_01_0.text: You Show Duel School is ranked #1 in fun!

V0502_36_00_00_0.text: This Duel is in your hands!

V0502_36_00_05_0.text: Sora! Teach 'em like you taught me!

V0502_08_00_00_0.text: I activate the Quick-Play Spell, Pianissimo!

V0502_08_00_01_0.text: I activate my Continuous Spell, Fortissimo!

V0502_08_00_02_0.text: My Continuous Spell Fortissimo's effect activates!

V0502_08_00_02_1.text: This Spell is music to my Melodious monster's ears!

V0502_08_00_03_0.text: I send Fortissimo to the Graveyard to activate its effect!

V0502_08_00_04_0.text: I activate my Spell Card, 1st Movement Solo!

V0502_08_00_05_0.text: I activate my Spell Card, Ostinato!

V0502_08_00_06_0.text: I activate my Spell card, Polymerization!

V0502_08_00_07_0.text: I activate the Equip Spell, Re-Fusion!

V0502_08_00_07_1.text: It Special Summons a Fusion Monster from my Graveyard!

V0502_08_00_08_0.text: I activate the Quick-Play Spell, De-Fusion!

V0502_08_00_09_0.text:
I activate my Equip Spell!
Cestus of Dagla!

V0502_08_00_11_0.text:
I activate my Field Spell!
The Sanctuary in the Sky!

V0502_08_00_12_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Spell!
The Fountain in the Sky!

V0502_08_00_13_0.text: I activate The Fountain in the Sky's effect!

V0502_08_00_14_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Cards from the Sky!

V0502_08_00_15_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Melodious Illusion!

V0502_08_00_16_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Trap!
Miraculous Descent!

V0502_08_00_17_0.text:
I activate my Trap Card!
Beckoning Light!

V0502_09_00_00_1.text:
Belt one out, Bloom Diva!
Wrecking Refrain!

V0502_09_00_01_0.text: Bloom Prima went to the Graveyard, so her effect activates!

V0502_09_00_02_0.text: Opera was used to Fusion Summon, so her effect activates!

V0502_09_00_03_0.text: I activate Canon the Melodious Diva's effect!

V0502_09_00_04_0.text: I send Score to the Graveyard to activate her effect!

V0502_09_00_05_0.text: By Special Summoning Tamtam, her effect activates!

V0502_09_00_06_0.text: By using Tamtam to Fusion Summon, her effect activates!

V0502_09_00_07_1.text: I Special Summon a LIGHT Fairy-Type monster from my hand!

V0502_09_00_10_0.text: When Soprano is Special Summoned, she can use her effect!

V0502_09_00_11_0.text: I use Soprano's effect to Fusion Summon!

V0502_09_00_12_0.text: Soprano can fuse without using a Fusion Spell!

V0502_09_00_13_0.text: Solo's effect activates when she's destroyed in battle!

V0502_09_00_15_0.text: Crystal Rose's effect activates from the Graveyard!

V0502_37_00_00_0.text:
Sing together a sensational duet!
I Fusion Summon!

V0502_13_00_00_0.text: Blossom in the spotlight, Bloom Diva the Melodious Choir!

V0502_37_00_01_0.text:
My monsters harmonize to become more melodic!
Fusion Summon!

V0502_13_00_01_0.text:
My showstopping songstress!
Bloom Prima the Melodious Choir!

V0502_13_00_02_0.text:
I present to you...
Aria the Melodious Diva!

V0502_13_00_08_0.text: Here's your cue, Sonata the Melodious Diva!

V0502_37_00_02_0.text: She's here to blow you away with her musical talent!

V0502_13_00_10_0.text:
Take center stage!
Level 8 Mozarta the Melodious Maestra!

V0502_37_00_03_0.text:
Harmonize to form a perfect musical blend!
I Fusion Summon!

V0502_13_00_11_0.text: Make your entrance, Schuberta the Melodious Maestra!

V0502_13_00_15_0.text: Julia, I promise I won't let you down!

V0502_13_00_15_1.text:
Crystal Rose!
This is your moment to shine!

V0502_19_00_03_0.text:
Elegy the Melodious Diva!
Let 'em hear you!

V0502_19_00_12_0.text: It's your moment to attack, Shopina!

V0502_27_00_02_0.text: I can't take much more of that...

V0502_44_00_02_0.text: Only one will rule the Duel...

V0502_44_00_03_0.text: In the ultimate fusion of monsters and mayhem!
